name: Everlasting Love Package
short_description: Capture the magic of your special day with full-day coverage, including pre-ceremony preparations, ceremony, reception, and a beautifully edited photo album.

name: Classic Portrait Session
short_description: A one-hour session perfect for individual or family portraits, with 15 professionally edited photos and an online gallery for easy sharing.

name: Corporate Event Coverage
short_description: Comprehensive photography coverage for corporate events, including conferences, seminars, and parties, with high-resolution 'image's delivered in a digital format.

name: Wanderlust Adventure Session
short_description: Document your travel adventures with stunning landscape and cultural photography, including a full day of shooting and a curated digital gallery.

name: Action Shot Package
short_description: High-energy sports photography capturing the intensity and excitement of the game, with up to 3 hours of coverage and a selection of 30 edited 'image's.

name: Wilderness Expedition
short_description: Immerse in nature with a full-day photography expedition, capturing wildlife and scenic landscapes, with a collection of 20 high-resolution 'image's.
